item.description:
Lindt Chocolate + Lia Sophia and more + Athena's Novelties - something for everyone!

This is always a LOT of fun... don't be shy!  A nice, relaxing girls' afternoon in!  I'm doing the Lindt chocolate tasting and then I'll have wine and cheese and crackers to snack on while we have 2 different demonstrators show us their wares and entertain us!  ;)   Sure to be hilarious.... 

A couple of things to note:

I have a VERY steep driveway so please be very careful walking up - park anywhere along the street at the bottom.   We are not ADA friendly for sure...

I have several pets!  If you are allergic, take some pills or something before you come!  I WILL have the giant dog secured upstairs with my hubby - just in case any of you look particularly edible that day... but the little dog will be roaming around... cats will probably be hiding with all the activity going on but no matter how much I vacuum there WILL be fur!  ;)

If you want to preview some of the items for sale:

Athena's - https://www.athenashn.com/order_interim_full.asp

Lia Sophia - http://www.liasophia.com/corporate/corporateCatalog.ls

Lindt chocolate - http://www.mylindtchocolatersvp.com/JoyofChocolate/
item.how_to_find_us: My addess in Wakefield will be sent to those attending...
item.name: "Guilty Pleasures" party! Girls only! Chocolate, purses, jewelry and "adult" !
